Crusader Project - I./StG 3 North Africa deployment
metadata.notes: I./StG 3 operated in North Africa from November 1941 until withdrawal to Germany in December 1942. Unit suffered heavy losses during the El Alamein campaign and subsequent retreat. Aircraft strength significantly degraded by Q4 1942 due to combat losses and mechanical failures. Commander changed from Maj Spangenberg to Hptm Horst Schiller on 1 December 1942. Aircraft transitioned from Ju 87D-1/Trop to newer Ju 87D-3/Trop variants during this quarter. Based at Haggag el Quasaba (Aug-Nov) and Gambut (Nov-Dec). Operational tempo decreased significantly due to Allied air superiority and supply difficulties during the retreat from El Alamein.
